MemberSignature.Value: public static void Choice<T> (Microsoft.Bot.Builder.Dialogs.IDialogContext context, Microsoft.Bot.Builder.Dialogs.ResumeAfter<T> resume, Microsoft.Bot.Builder.Dialogs.IPromptOptions<T> promptOptions, bool recognizeChoices = true, bool recognizeNumbers = true, bool recognizeOrdinals = true, double minScore = 0.4);

.method public static hidebysig void Choice<T>(class Microsoft.Bot.Builder.Dialogs.IDialogContext context, class Microsoft.Bot.Builder.Dialogs.ResumeAfter`1<!!T> resume, class Microsoft.Bot.Builder.Dialogs.IPromptOptions`1<!!T> promptOptions, bool recognizeChoices, bool recognizeNumbers, bool recognizeOrdinals, float64 minScore) cil managed

Public Shared Sub Choice(Of T) (context As IDialogContext, resume As ResumeAfter(Of T), promptOptions As IPromptOptions(Of T), Optional recognizeChoices As Boolean = true, Optional recognizeNumbers As Boolean = true, Optional recognizeOrdinals As Boolean = true, Optional minScore As Double = 0.4)

static member Choice : Microsoft.Bot.Builder.Dialogs.IDialogContext * Microsoft.Bot.Builder.Dialogs.ResumeAfter<'T> * Microsoft.Bot.Builder.Dialogs.IPromptOptions<'T> * bool * bool * bool * double -> unit
MemberSignature.Usage: Microsoft.Bot.Builder.Dialogs.PromptDialog.Choice (context, resume, promptOptions, recognizeChoices, recognizeNumbers, recognizeOrdinals, minScore)

Docs.param: (Optional) if true, the prompt will attempt to recognize the selected value using the choices themselves. The default value is "true".
(Optional) if true, the prompt will attempt to recognize numbers in the users utterance as the index of the choice to return. The default value is "true".
(Optional) if true, the prompt will attempt to recognize ordinals like "the first one" or "the second one" as the index of the choice to return. The default value is "true".
(Optional) minimum score from 0.0 - 1.0 needed for a recognized choice to be considered a match. The default value is "0.4".
Docs.summary: Prompt for one of a set of choices.

MemberSignature.Usage: Microsoft.Bot.Builder.Dialogs.PromptDialog.Choice (context, resume, choices, prompt, retry, attempts, promptStyle, descriptions, recognizeChoices, recognizeNumbers, recognizeOrdinals, minScore)

Docs.param: Dictionary with the options to choose from as a key and their synonyms as a value.
The prompt to show to the user.
The number of times to retry.
(Optional) if true, the prompt will attempt to recognize the selected value using the choices themselves. The default value is "true".
(Optional) if true, the prompt will attempt to recognize numbers in the users utterance as the index of the choice to return. The default value is "true".
(Optional) if true, the prompt will attempt to recognize ordinals like "the first one" or "the second one" as the index of the choice to return. The default value is "true".
(Optional) minimum score from 0.0 - 1.0 needed for a recognized choice to be considered a match. The default value is "0.4".
Docs.summary: Prompt for one of a set of choices.
